Address.value: 238 MAIN STREET,9TH FLOOR, CAMBRIDGE, Massachusetts, 02142, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Beam Therapeutics Inc is a biotechnology company engaged in creating genetic medicines based on its base editing technology. This technology enables a new class of genetic medicines that targets a single base in the genome without making a double-stranded break in the DNA. The company's portfolio comprises Gene Correction, Gene Modification, Gene Activation, Gene Silencing, and Multiplex Editing.

value.name: John Evans
value.title: Chief Executive Officer, CFO, CAO & Director
